channel.title: Grenadine on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Grenadine on Need a drink?

item.title: Artist's special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml Scotch
  • 30 ml Oloroso sherry
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup
  • lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Scofflaw
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml rye whisky
  • 25 ml dry vermouth
  • 10 ml grenadine
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.
